price: 64. So they turned to themselves and said: "Verily, you are the Zâlimûn (polytheists and wrong-doers)."
arabic: فَرَجَعُوٓاْ إِلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِمۡ فَقَالُوٓاْ إِنَّكُمۡ أَنتُمُ ٱلظَّٰلِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: farajaʿū ilā anfusihim faqālū innakum antumu al-ẓālimūna
